edu.stanford.nlp.wordseg

Class ChineseDictionary

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.wordseg.ChineseDictionary

  • public class ChineseDictionary
extends Object
    This class provides a main method that loads various dictionaries, and saves them in a serialized version, and runtime compiles them into a word list used as a feature in the segmenter. The features are added in the method Sighan2005DocumentReaderAndWriter.addDictionaryFeatures(edu.stanford.nlp.wordseg.ChineseDictionary, java.lang.Class<? extends edu.stanford.nlp.ling.CoreAnnotation<java.lang.String>>, java.lang.Class<? extends edu.stanford.nlp.ling.CoreAnnotation<java.lang.String>>, java.lang.Class<? extends edu.stanford.nlp.ling.CoreAnnotation<java.lang.String>>, java.lang.String, java.util.List<edu.stanford.nlp.ling.CoreLabel>).
    Author:
    Pi-Chuan Chang
